snippet: Hovnanian Enterprises, the largest home builder in the state, benefited from new single-family home sales that beat analysts’ expectations.
abstract: Hovnanian Enterprises, largest home builder in New Jersey, benefits from new single-family homes that beat analysts' expectations; first-quarter loss was $18.3 million, or 17 cents a share, compared with loss of $64.1 million, or 82 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Hovnanian Enterprises, the largest home builder in the state, benefited from new single-family home sales that beat analysts’ expectations.

headline.seo: Rising Demand for Homes Eases Loss for Hovnanian Enterprises
headline.main: Rising Demand Eases Loss for New Jersey Home Builder
headline.print_headline: Rising Demand Eases Loss For New Jersey Home Builder
